product.title: OPPO Find N
product.description: Oppo Find N 5G, the first foldable flagship from OPPO features a 5.4″ AMOLED outer screen and 7.1″ LTPO AMOLED display when unfolded. It runs on Snapdragon 888 5G octa-core processor and features Adreno 660 GPU. The smartphone comes with 8GB / 12GB RAM and 256GB / 512Gb internal storage options.

Specification.Processor: Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Cortex-X1 & 3x2.42 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A55)
Specification.Display: Foldable LTPO AMOLED, 120Hz, HDR10+, 500 nits (typ), 800 nits (HBM), 1000 nits (peak), 7.1 inches, 162.2 cm2 (~87.3% screen-to-body ratio)

product.title: OPPO Find X5
product.description: The OPPO Find X5 Pro comes with 6.55-inch OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor. Specs also include 4800mAh battery with 80W charging speed, Triple camera setup on the back with 50MP main sensor and 32MP front selfie camera.

Specification.Processor: Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Cortex-X1 & 3x2.42 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A55
Specification.Display: AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, 500 nits (typ), 800 nits (HBM), 1000 nits (peak), 6.55 inches, 103.6 cm2 (~89.0% screen-to-body ratio), 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~402 ppi density)

product.title: OPPO Find X3 Pro
product.description: OPPO Find X3 Pro, labeled the first camera-to-screen 'billion colors' phone, offers the best display and most thoughtful camera set in a long time, all the while it manages to fit great in the hand, and dazzle with a unique Microlens photography.

Specification.Processor: Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Cortex-X1 & 3x2.42 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A55)
Specification.Display: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, BT.2020, 500 nits (typ), 1300 nits (peak), 6.7 inches, 108.4 cm2 (~89.6% screen-to-body ratio), 1440 x 3216 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~525 ppi density)

product.title: VIVO X80 Pro
product.description: The vivo X80 Pro comes with 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor. Specs also include 4700mAh battery with 80W charging speed, Quad camera setup on the back with 50MP main sensor and 32MP front selfie camera.

Specification.Operating System: Android 12, upgradable to Android 13, Funtouch 13 (Global), Origin OS Ocean (China)
Specification.Processor: Octa-core (1x3.00 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.50 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A510)
Specification.Graphics: Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm), Adreno 730
Specification.Display: LTPO3 AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1500 nits (peak), 6.78 inches, 111.4 cm2 (~89.9% screen-to-body ratio), 1440 x 3200 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~517 ppi density)

product.title: VIVO V25 Pro
product.description: The Vivo V25 Pro 5G smartphone is perfectly suited for multitaskers, you can effortlessly elevate your entertainment to a different extreme and enhance your productivity. This phone boosts your performance with its magnificent 16.66 cm (6.56) POLED display and quick 120 Hz refresh rate.

Specification.Display: AMOLED, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1300 nits (peak), 6.56 inches, 104.6 cm2 (~89.6% screen-to-body ratio), 1080 x 2376 pixels (~398 ppi density)

product.title: OPPO Reno 8
product.description: The Reno8 is a solid all-rounder with a good chipset, nice screen, long battery life, blazing-fast charging and excellent camera performance, including the selfie. However, as it's usually the case with Oppo smartphones, it's its pricing that keeps us from recommending it straight up.

product.title: OPPO Reno 8 Pro
product.description: Reno8 Pro is powered by the Dimensity 8100 Max. It is an octa-core CPU that can boost up to a 2.85GHz, and it is paired with a Mali-G610 MC6 GPU. videos, and enables 4K Ultra HDR Video from the primary rear camera.

product.title: VIVO T1x
product.description: VIVO T1x with 6.58″ FHD+ 90Hz display, Snapdragon 680, up to 6GB RAM, 5000mAh battery launched in India starting at Rs. 11999. vivo just launched the T1x smartphone in India, as it had promised. It has a 6.58-inch FHD+ LCD screen with 90Hz refresh rate and an 8MP front camera inside the notch.

product.title: VIVO V23e
product.description: Vivo V23e 5G is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 810 processor. It comes with 8GB of RAM. The Vivo V23e 5G runs Android 12 and is powered by a 4050mAh battery. The Vivo V23e 5G supports proprietary fast charging.

product.title: OPPO A94
product.description: The OPPO A94 is a mid-range smartphone that features a 6.43-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, 48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP quad rear cameras, and a single 32MP selfie camera on a small punch-hole. It runs on a MediaTek Helio P95 chipset with 8GB of RAM, Android 11 OS, and ColorOS software. There's also an under-display fingerprint scanner, 4G LTE connectivity, and 128GB of expandable storage.

Specification.Graphics: Mediatek MT6779V Helio P95 (12 nm), PowerVR GM9446
Specification.Display: AMOLED, 430 nits (typ), 800 nits (peak), 6.43 inches, 99.8 cm2 (~85.2% screen-to-body ratio), 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~409 ppi density)

product.title: VIVO Y02
product.description: VIVO Y02 comes with a 6.51-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 720x1600 pixels (HD+). Vivo Y02 is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 2GB, 3GB of RAM. The Vivo Y02 runs Android 12 Go Edition and is powered by a 5000mAh battery.

Specification.Display: IPS LCD, 6.51 inches, 102.3 cm2 (~82.5% screen-to-body ratio), 720 x 1600 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~270 ppi density)

product.title: OPPO A16
product.description: Oppo A16 comes with a 6.52-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 720x1600 pixels at a pixel density of 269 pixels per inch (ppi). Oppo A16 is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Helio G35 processor. It comes with 3GB of RAM. The Oppo A16 runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery.

Specification.Graphics: Mediatek MT6765G Helio G35 (12 nm), PowerVR GE8320
Specification.Display: IPS LCD, 480 nits (typ), 6.52 inches, 102.6 cm2 (~82.9% screen-to-body ratio), 720 x 1600 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~269 ppi density)

product.title: VIVO Y22s
product.description: The VIVO Y22s is a smartphone that features a 6.55-inch HD+ display, 50MP + 2MP dual rear cameras, and an 8MP selfie camera. It runs on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 chipset with either 4GB or 8GB of RAM, up to 8GB of additional virtual RAM, Android 12 OS, and Funtouch 12 interface. There's also a side-mounted fingerprint scanner, 4G LTE connectivity, dual-band Wi-Fi, and 128GB of expandable storage.

Specification.Processor: Octa-core (4x2.4 GHz Kryo 265 Gold & 4x1.9 GHz Kryo 265 Silver)
Specification.Display: IPS LCD, 6.55 inches, 103.1 cm2 (~82.4% screen-to-body ratio), 720 x 1612 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~270 ppi density)

product.title: OPPO A95
product.description: The OPPO A95 is a 'midrange' smartphone that features a 6.43-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, 48MP + 2MP + 2MP triple rear cameras, and a 16MP punch-hole selfie camera. It runs on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 chipset with 8GB of RAM, 5GB of additional extended RAM, Android 11 OS, and ColorOS 11.1 software. There's also an under-display fingerprint scanner, 4G LTE connectivity, dual-band Wi-Fi, and 128GB of expandable storage. A large 5,000mAh battery powers the device with support for 33W SuperVOOC 2.0 fast charging technology.

Specification.Processor: Octa-core (4x2.0 GHz Kryo 260 Gold & 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 260 Silver)
Specification.Display: AMOLED, 430 nits (typ), 800 nits (peak), 6.43 inches, 99.8 cm2 (~84.4% screen-to-body ratio), 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~409 ppi density)
